Fields

currentHeuristics

Index of the current heuristic set used during an Assemblage

Declaration
public int currentHeuristics
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

heuristicsMode

  • 0 - manual via currentHeuristics parameter
  • 1 - Field driven, via Field iWeights
Declaration
public int heuristicsMode
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

receiverSelectionMode

receiver selection mode

  • 0 - random
  • 1 - scalar Field nearest
  • 2 - scalar Field interpolated
  • 3 - dense packing - minimum sum of weights around candidate

Declaration
public int receiverSelectionMode
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

ruleSelectionMode

Rule selection mode

  • 0 - random
  • 1 - scalar field nearest
  • 2 - scalar field interpolated
  • 3 - vector field nearest (monodirectional)
  • 4 - vector field interpolated (monodirectional)
  • 5 - vector field nearest (bidirectional)
  • 6 - vector field interpolated (bidirectional)
  • 7 - minimum sender + receiver AABB (Axis-Aligned Bounding Box) volume
  • 8 - minimum sender + receiver AABB (Axis-Aligned Bounding Box) diagonal
  • 9 - weighted random choice

Declaration
public int ruleSelectionMode
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32
